ai-tha-ap326:1.2_0: I used to be as solitary.
ai-tha-ap326:3.2_0: transport, a pit of glowing coals.
ai-tha-ap326:3.3_0: Cāla, when the sun has risen,
ai-tha-ap326:4.1_0: You’ve plucked out all the places of all,
ai-tha-ap326:4.4_0: this is declared of the word.
ai-tha-ap326:5.2_0: because of my mother, my father,
ai-tha-ap326:5.3_0: They’re not far from the community by theft,
ai-tha-ap326:6.1_0: serving those who live in comfort,
ai-tha-ap326:6.3_0: They have seen the Truths of others,
ai-tha-ap326:6.4_0: these are the qualities of praise.
ai-tha-ap326:8.2_0: world’s Elder, unskilled in the world,
ai-tha-ap326:8.3_0: But then I sat close by me,
ai-tha-ap326:10.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap326:10.4_0: and the fruit of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap326:11.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap326:12.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saṅgāmaji.
